title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, fry bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crispy.
In a bowl, beat eggs and mix in grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
Drain pasta and reserve 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with bacon and remove from heat.
Pour egg mixture over pasta and toss quickly, adding pasta water as needed for creaminess.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and fresh parsley.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for at least 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a large pan and cook marinated chicken until golden. Set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in coconut milk and tikka paste, then add cooked chicken.
Simmer for 20-25 minutes until sauce thickens.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve over basmati rice.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce on a thin crust.
instructions: Preheat oven to 220C (425F).
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Tear mozzarella into pieces and distribute over sauce.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Top with fresh basil leaves and serve hot.

title: Pad Thai
summary: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, eggs, and peanuts in a tangy tamarind sauce.
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 15 minutes, then drain.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Stir-fry shrimp and tofu until cooked, about 3-4 minutes.
Push ingredients to the side and scramble eggs in the pan.
Add noodles and toss everything together.
Mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and palm sugar, then pour over noodles.
Toss in bean sprouts and green onions.
Serve topped with crushed peanuts and lime wedges.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef in warm tortillas with lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.
instructions: Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Add diced onion and sauté until softened, about 2 minutes.
Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up as it cooks.
Drain excess fat if needed.
Stir in taco seasoning and a splash of water, simmer for 3-4 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Assemble tacos with meat, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake with creamy chocolate frosting and a smooth ganache topping.
instructions: Preheat oven to 175C (350F) and grease two round cake pans.
Mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl.
Add eggs, buttermilk, coffee, oil, and vanilla extract.
Beat until smooth.
Pour batter evenly into prepared pans.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes, then turn out onto wire racks.
Once cooled, frost with chocolate frosting and serve.
